reviews.review: Those critics that   gave a bad review to Avengers Infinity wars, can kiss my a**!!  awesome!!! spectacular!! best of the best!!!

Trying to keep this as spoiler free as possible since we're ahead in time zones and the internet abhors spoilage like a germaphobe with a broken fridge, I have to say this is my favourite Marvel movie to date.
Of late, the MCU has been plagued with a disease known as 'no consequence-itis' a horrible condition that means that the plot points are predictable and everything takes place in a safe little world where plot armor abounds and you can be sure of a nice ending with a little bow on it.
But not here.
Not in Infinity World.
Ending on a cliffhanger where you're sure you know what's going to happen in the next one, our expectations have already been subverted by this first movie of a clear two parter, and all that remains is uncertainty, and with uncertainty comes fear and consequences. Two things that the MCU has been missing for a while now.
I can't really say more in depth other than good acting, good pacing, good writing and really just well done at getting to this point over a ten year stretch. Hand on heart, I didn't think they could pull it off but they did.
I loved every minute of this I was on the edge of my seat the whole movie my only real griped is we never got to learn more about the black order but other than that this movie was great
This movie is so fucking awesome
Quite a feat to string all the Marvel plots together into a thrilling and emotional whole!
A comic lovers dream come true

A very entertaining and jam packed Avengers Movie, that needs to run long in order to fit in the abundance of MCU characters all coming together, but doesn't feel overly long as everyone is busy doing something to bring the movie together. It's very hard to accurately gauge how you feel about the movie as the credits roll due to the way the movie ends, but when all is said and done by the end of 2019 I'm sure the overall feeling will be vastly improved.
Love it love it and looking forward to 2 part next year
Stunning, loud, action-packed with appealing characters.
